content.question: What is the mass of the rod?

choices.label: <math alttext="one fourth times the fraction with numerator K T squared, and denominator pi squared" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="three fourths times the fraction with numerator k T squared, and denominator pi squared" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="three halves times the fraction with numerator k T squared, and denominator pi squared" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
